Header.title: Welcome to Medi Plus Jaffna Hospital
Header.paragraph: Providing quality healthcare services with advanced medical technology and experienced professionals.

About.paragraph: Medi Plus Jaffna Hospital is committed to offering comprehensive healthcare services, including emergency care, specialized treatments, and diagnostic facilities. Our team of skilled doctors and medical professionals ensure the best patient care.

Features.text: Our emergency department is open 24/7 with dedicated staff to handle all critical cases efficiently.

Features.title: Cardiology
Features.text: Expert cardiologists providing advanced heart care and treatment.

Features.title: Advanced Diagnostics
Features.text: State-of-the-art diagnostic facilities, including MRI, CT scans, and laboratory testing.

Features.title: Specialized Treatments
Features.text: Multi-specialty services covering various medical fields including neurology, orthopedics, and pediatrics.
